availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Whittington (Caldwell County, Kentucky, wagon maker and grocery merchant)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, wagon maker and grocery merchant. Native of Warwickshire, England. Married to Mary M. Mercer Whittington in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1848. Father of Mary Whittington. Wagon maker in Caldwell County in 1850. Grocery merchant in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 330A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 111.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 511A-B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
"Richard Whittington (1820-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #117494176, accessed March 1, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/117494176.
